author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF THE NORTHERN LEEWARD ISLANDS... ...ERIN IS FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE BY TOMORROW...
summary: ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF THE NORTHERN LEEWARD ISLANDS... ...ERIN IS FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE BY TOMORROW... As of 5:00 PM AST Thu Aug 14 the center of Erin was located near 16.7, -51.2 with movement W at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF THE NORTHERN LEEWARD ISLANDS... ...ERIN IS FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE BY TOMORROW... title: Summary - Tropical Storm Erin (AT5/AL052025)
